item.title: Adding farming to donar area
item.dc:creator: @stickywicky stickywicky
item.description:
@stickywicky wrote:

hi,
im tying to add farming to my donaters area but i dont know how to ive tried going into the skilling folder then opened farming and copy and pasted a command and changed the co-ordinates
here is the command in farming normally

public int getExp() { for (int j = 0; j < HERBS.length; j++) if (HERBS[j] == c.farm[0]) return HERB_EXPS[j]; return 0; } 
public void updateHerbPatch() {
	if (c.farm[0] > 0 && c.farm[1] > 0) {
		//make object here
		//c.sendMessage("Make herbs...");
		c.getPA().object(PATCH_HERBS,2813,3463,-1,10);
	} else {
		//make weed patch here
		//c.sendMessage("Make weeds...");
		c.getPA().object(PATCH_WEEDS,2813,3463,-1,10);
                           }</blockquote>

and now i copy that and change the co-ords and that section now looks like this

public void updateHerbPatch() { if (c.farm[0] > 0 && c.farm[1] > 0) { //make object here //c.sendMessage("Make herbs..."); c.getPA().object(PATCH_HERBS,2813,3463,-1,10); } else { //make weed patch here //c.sendMessage("Make weeds..."); c.getPA().object(PATCH_WEEDS,2813,3463,-1,10); } 
	if (c.farm[0] > 0 && c.farm[1] > 0) {
		//make object here
		//c.sendMessage("Make herbs...");
		c.getPA().object(PATCH_HERBS,2705,9771,-1,10);
	} else {
		//make weed patch here
		//c.sendMessage("Make weeds...");
		c.getPA().object(PATCH_WEEDS,2705,9771,-1,10);
	}	
}</blockquote>

but this didnt work :O…
so any help would be nice
note im using project-insanity is my base

also
when we added a stall to object file then looked for gettheiving in 1 of the files… we found the 3 stalls that are in the server when we got…we tried adding our own under that in your donater zone…but that wont give us any items :?
